Description: A landscape with the Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Holy Family resting on the road, an angel minding the donkey, a fortified building on a mound beyond Pen and brown ink
Curator's comments: Lit.: N. Turner, 'Italian Drawings in the BM, Roman Baroque Drawings', London, 1999, I, no. 135 Turner 1999 Literature: London, 1984(b), no. 42.
Bibliographic references: Turner 1999 / Roman Baroque Drawings c.1620 to c.1700 (135)
